item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260202.1)
item.description:
What's New

refactor: Remove AX verification, skip restore on potential desync

Remove Accessibility API verification for buffer-screen matching due to

race condition issues (AX returns stale data during rapid backspacing).

Instead of querying AX to verify, simply skip restore when cursor moved

or focus changed during typing - this is safer and more reliable.

  • Remove getLastWordCallback and verifyBufferMatchesScreen from VNEngine
  • Remove getLastWordBeforeCursor from CharacterInjector
  • Remove AX callback wiring from KeyboardEventHandler
  • Update tests to match new skip-restore behavior
